<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wave Spiral](/Feats.aspx?ID=7504) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=606" />
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=656" />
<trait label="Occult" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=662" />
<trait label="Water" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=732" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Rival Academies](/Sources.aspx?ID=235) pg. 81

**Frequency**
once per minute

**Prerequisites**
[Reflective Ripple Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=7493)

**Requirements**
You’re in Reflective Ripple Stance.

</column>

---

You dip and spin, unleashing a wide whirlpool of water. Make an Athletics check to [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=2382) each creature standing on the ground in a 10-foot emanation. These attacks all count toward your multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn’t increase until after you make all the attacks.
name: Wave Spiral
